segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink, so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's overflowing steadily, creating this sheet down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling around her feet, but her face stays calm and unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me think how easily disasters sneak up on us.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching high into the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance looks off; the stool's tilting back precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be really painful for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is expectant, arm up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing this secret moment, but at what risk?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so serene, a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching this potential heartache unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe the woman will turn and save the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But right now, it's all hanging in the balance.
segments.speaker: PAR
